title: India Pak PubG Love Story
selftext:
Seema Haider, a Pakistani citizen and Sachin Meena, an India citizen fell in love while playing PubG. They got married and she came to India via Nepal Border. She has 4 kids from the previous marriage and her husband claims they were still married when she left. What is your opinion on this situation?

Sources:

https://www.independent.co.uk/asia/south-asia/seema-haider-pakistani-girl-pubg-b2373108.html

https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.thestatesman.com/who-is/who-is-seema-haider-who-sneaks-in-india-with-4-kids-to-meet-her-pubg-lover-1503196775.html/amp

https://www.google.com/amp/s/m.timesofindia.com/city/noida/in-india-for-love-bail-to-pak-woman-indian-lover/amp_articleshow/101587439.cms
